title.rendered: Demandium v2.5: Schedule Booking & Wishlist Features Added

content.rendered:
Team 6amTech has released yet another amazing feature release for Demandium v2.5 for all its existing and new users. The latest update is beneficial for businesses of all sizes and places. Most importantly, it brings the most trendy user experience via new feature additions and existing feature improvements. 

So let’s check out what we have in store for you! 

Demandium v2.5 Feature List: 

✅ Schedule booking options during checkout

✅ Wishlist for customers 

✅ Minimum payable amount for providers

✅ Referral bonus on first booking 

Other than these, many features and UI/UX improvements have been added for better performance and conversion. So, let’s learn the details below 👇

Explore: Demandium - On Demand Service App Live Demo

Schedule booking options during checkout

Customers can now schedule a booking during checkout from the Demandium website or mobile app. This allows customers to choose their preferred time to receive service and providers to be prepared before providing a service. Not only this, the admin can also control the time restriction on schedule booking in case someone wants to place a booking in advance.

Path: Admin Panel> System Management > Business Settings > Bookings

Now, the admin can set a delay period for customers to book services in advance. Once enabled, customers can only schedule bookings according to the specified time period. 

The Demandium Flutter web app looks like this in the front end when the schedule booking and restriction on booking is enabled ⬇️

Path: Flutter Web App > Checkout Page > Booking Details

Wishlist for Customers

Customers can now pin or wishlist services and providers with the wishlist feature of the new Demandium v2.5 release. This allows customers to easily find their favorite service and service providers to place a booking- reducing the checkout time.

Path: Flutter Web App> Menu > My Favorite

Referral bonus on first booking

As Demandium previously had a referral bonus for the referee, now customers can also earn referral bonuses on their first order! Let me explain. Previously on Demandium, if a customer newly registered with a referral code, the existing user (who’s shared the referral code) will receive a referral bonus to their wallets. But in the v2.5 release of Demandium, this feature is also available for both new and existing customers. This means the newly registered customer will also receive a discount code after using the referral code while registering. 

Here’s how it works ⬇️

SS 1: Customer shares their referral code with others

SS 2: New customer applies the coupon code from the checkout page 

In the backend, the admin can set up the referral earning amount, discount type, and discount validity from the Demandium admin panel.

Path: Admin Panel> System Management< Business Settings> Customers 

Minimum payable amount for providers

Admin can now set minimum payable amount for the providers. So when a provider reaches the certain threshold, they must pay the admin to continue their operations. This will ensure regular cash in-flow from providers to admin.

Path: Admin Panel> System Mangement> Business Settings> Providers

Here are some other features that were launched 👇

  • New email notifications to customers for ‘reset password’.
  • Skipped language selection screen for apps when only one language is active.
  • Enhanced onboarding screen UI for admin and provider panel.
  • If a customer accepts a bid request from a provider and proceeds to checkout, the provider can have the ability to delete or withdraw their bid request before the booking is placed. 
  • Customers can book a service for ASAP. 
  • Made the Flutter app compatible with Flutter SDK 3.19.5 

That’s it for this release. Let’s see what amazing features Demandium has to offer pretty soon!
